original_title: The Wanderers: The Quest of The Demon Hunter
overview: A hardened vampire hunter and a journalist travel to a village in Transylvania to investigate a mysterious event that happened in Zalesky Castle. The duo are guided by a young Romanian girl and joined by a Korean television reality show team as they attempt to untangle the community’s secrets.
tagline: There is something real and scarier than vampires in Transylvania.
title: The Wanderers: The Quest of The Demon Hunter
